title: Zoomic
author: Zoomic
content: I really want to be here on a daily basis to learn and share knowledge with the forum members but I am not permitted by time to be here, which I believe it's because I really offer nothing here and I also do not seek for anything here.Is there a possibility that I can do some jobs for people here with my time because I got alot of it this time. This could help me be more active here because if I remember that I have an unfinished task here I'll be compelled to login and do the job. By this bitcointalk.org will have big part of my dairy. I do not have much skills but I can do the following;1. Build a HTML website + css and tailwind css.2. Javascript (next.js and a little of node.js); I'm still learning on this.3. I can work as visual assistant 4. I can do any legitimate job with little training.5. I can do any type of writing job(especially fictional, or when given a topic to write about)6. The advantage I have is my availability, fast learning and willingness to learn. 7. I am not much concerned about the bucks, but atleast if I can keep my internet subscription going I'll be happy. 8. My goal is to be here almost on a daily basis and what something to keep me here.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: What can keep you here for long is your attitude, the ki d of person you are, what you want or do and how coming to this noble forum should be another better opportunity for you to fast track your leaning ground about bitcoin, read on bitcoin, learn about the forum's rules and regulations, be active in posting, dont spam and don't be too greedy or eager in making money, take time to understand the forum better, if your intentions were to stay.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: You can keep yourself more active here by actually doing something like replying to topics that you are more knowledgeable about. You can counter other members opinions based on the experience you have had with the topic or OP. There are lots of boards here, and you have already stated that you want to share knowledge, so you can do that on different forum boards depending on what you are really good at: bitcoin discussion, Economic, [trading discussion, politics and society, bitcoin mining, bitcoin technical support, etc. You can select from the home menu; all the boards have little descriptions.You stated that you have those skills, so if you believe you have them well enough, you can create a thread on the service board and be open to being hired if someone needs any of those services.

comments.author: zaki12
comments.body: Being in this forum is a gift for you.  Because these forums can be a good place to share and gain knowledge, as well as forge relationships with people who share the same interests.  In terms of making money, this forum may provide opportunities to earn income in various ways, such as your expertise.  but the main purpose of this forum is to provide a place for users to learn, discuss, and share knowledge about bitcoin and cryptocurrencies.Here are some tips that can help you feel at home and feel comfortable on the bitcointalk forum.Choose a topic that interests you: Choose a topic that matches your interests and knowledge so you can better contribute to the discussion.Respect fellow users: Always speak politely and respect the opinions of others, even if you disagree with them.  Avoid using harsh words or insulting fellow users.Active participation: Try to actively participate in the discussion by asking questions, providing suggestions or opinions, or sharing your experiences that are relevant to the topic of discussion.Don't be afraid to ask questions: If there's something you don't understand or want to know more, don't be afraid to ask.  Forums are a great place to learn and share knowledge.Don't make the forum a place to debate sensitive or personal topics: Avoid discussing topics that could create unnecessary debate or conflict, such as politics or religion.Be a responsible user: Avoid behavior that can harm or damage the forum, such as spamming or using inappropriate language.That way I think you can feel at home and comfortable on these bitcointalk forums and can derive some useful benefits from the bitcointalk forums.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: In my experience its not worth the effort to look for jobs in crypto space. They are too scarce, and you spend more time finding them than actually working. Better just find a good full time employment or build a freelance career. Then use your fiat earnings to buy Bitcoin - you will have way more Bitcoin this way than trying to earn it directly.

They are too scarce, and you spend more time finding them than actually working. Better just find a good full time employment or build a freelance career. Then use your fiat earnings to buy Bitcoin - you will have way more Bitcoin this way than trying to earn it directly.I somehow agree with your statement- the job that some have is too specific for some to even consider. Though you may post your services and create a thread for it, other than that, you should focus on other spaces as well.As someone who currently participates in a campaign signature, it is my duty to at least engage in fruitful discussions about a certain topic. I spend around 2-5 hours daily browsing through threads and reading comments in order to keep myself engaged to the topic.I do recommend that you aim on contributing to the forum by joining into discussions in order to increase your forum rank in this journey. If you are able to participate in campaign signatures, then that is one reason to keep you being active in discussions here in this forum.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Quote from: Zoomic on April 12, 2023, 09:50:45 PMI really want to be here on a daily basis to learn and share knowledge with the forum members but I am not permitted by time to be here, which I believe it's because I really offer nothing here and I also do not seek for anything here.I guess you already have a reason not to want to be here and that's in the fact that according to you, you seek nothing here and to add, you've got no sense of responsibility as in commitment. That's enough to keep you out but, owning an account here means, you really should be getting involved. If you believe in cryptocurrency or think it has got something to offer in the nearest future, then you've got reasons to gather knowledge about it so as to better prepare yourself for tomorrow. It would be awful to let this chance of learning and getting on the cryptocurrency network early enough. Find reasons and know that, you are the one stopping you from coming here regularly.

comments.author: LSDadventure
comments.body: Quote from: Zoomic on April 12, 2023, 09:50:45 PMI really want to be here on a daily basis to learn and share knowledge with the forum members but I am not permitted by time to be here, which I believe it's because I really offer nothing here and I also do not seek for anything here.Biggest reasons for you to stay here and being actively here are- You believe in Bitcoin.- You believe in blockchain technology.- You want to work here to receive your payment in Bitcoin or altcoins.- You want to learn more about Bitcoin, get technical support from a biggest Bitcoin community forum.- You want to share your knowledge and experience with other forum members.Above all and most important, be careful with links, PMs and don't let your devices infected, you will lose your coins after that.

comments.body: Quote from: Zoomic on April 12, 2023, 09:50:45 PMIs there a possibility that I can do some jobs for people here with my time because I got alot of it this time. This could help me be more active here because if I remember that I have an unfinished task here I'll be compelled to login and do the job. I am surprised that none of the above responses mentioned signature campaigns. You will have to wait until you are at least a Full Member, and then you can apply to join the signature campaigns that you can see advertised in the Services section. To do so, continue to use the forum responsibly and gradually increase your knowledge. You will have to be more active on the forum and post regularly. If not every day, then a minimum of 5 days a week I would say.If you notice, almost all of us who have responded wear a signature because we participate in signature campaigns.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: For me, it sounds like this: "I don't know what I need here, but I think I'm needed here."I think you are wrong. To be honest, the forum should be for you. It's you who came here; this is not a forum for you. The forum is full of information; this is what is valuable; your knowledge is typical; and what you offer is typical.You can correct your thinking by saying that if you are here, if you read, learn new information, and become more informed about new technologies, it is this knowledge that will help you become the most in demand.But if you are looking for a job here, then again, you need to make your resume more attractive, and it is advisable to connect it with the specifics of the forum.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Speaking of time issues, you can set aside a few minutes of free time that you have to study and share knowledge here. Everyone has free time, even the president. The trick is in yourself how to set the time to be active here. Once connected to the forum, you will feel at home here. Lots of positive things that can help add insight and you can also make money on forums with some of the services you offer. You can offer services that are mastered on the Service Board that has been recommended by @Dr.Bitcoin_Strange and @SatoPrincess, when someone is interested in your services they will contact you maybe they can work together if the offer is suitable.

Bitcoin knowledge to me is the highest knowledge one can have in the is forum because it will safe you from financial problems,if you invest in bitcoin and learn the movement of bitcoin in a cyclic pattern. You will also know how to keep your wallet safe. So don't wait until you have a job based on your skill in the forum before,you will be active here. This forum is not a money making place but a community with bags of knowledge. The love and believe on bitcoin is enough to keep you active in the forum Gracias.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: You almost have all the keys to being an important member here, and all you lack is motivation.What are the things that motivate you?This incentive differs from one person to another. Some have their motivation:Funds: You can create a topic in services board or join signature campaigns.Reputation: Give free tips and participate in free campaigns.Friends: There are a lot of friendships that can be made here.Other incentives: Unfortunately, the forum tends to hide identity, as other incentives such as acquaintance, dating and animation do not exist here.Find your motivation and you will stay.
